alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 9:59AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prairie, northeastern Lonoke and south central White Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 959 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McCreanor, or near Lonoke, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lonoke... Des Arc... Carlisle... Barrettsville... Thurman... McCreanor... Prairie Center... Sisemore... Griffithville... Vinity Corner... Walker... Hayley... Childers... Hickory Plains... Jasmine... Butlerville... Woodlawn... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 173 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
